00021 class FindFile :
00022     public NS(lang,Object)
00023 {
00024 public:
00028     enum FindFlags
00029     {
00031         FIND_RECURSE    = 1,
00033         FIND_FILESONLY  = 2,
00035         FIND_DEFAULT    = FIND_RECURSE|FIND_FILESONLY,
00036         
00038         FIND_DIRECTORIESONLY = 4
00039     };
00040 
00044     enum AttribFlags
00045     {
00047         ATTRIB_NORMAL   = 0,
00049         ATTRIB_ARCHIVE  = 1,
00051         ATTRIB_HIDDEN   = 2,
00053         ATTRIB_READONLY = 4,
00055         ATTRIB_SUBDIR   = 8,
00057         ATTRIB_SYSTEM   = 16,
00058     };
00059 
00063     struct Data
00064     {
00066         int         attrib;
00068         time_t      writeTime;
00070         size_t      size;
00072         PathName    path;
00073     };
00074 
00083     explicit FindFile( const NS(lang,String)& filter, int flags=FIND_DEFAULT );
00084 
00088     ~FindFile();
00089 
00093     void            next();
00094 
00098     bool            more() const;
00099 
00103     const Data&     data() const;
00104 
00110     static bool     isFileExist( const NS(lang,String)& filter, int flags=FIND_DEFAULT );
00111 
00112 private:
00113     class Impl;
00114     P(Impl) m_impl;
00115 
00116     FindFile( const FindFile& );
00117     FindFile& operator=( const FindFile& );
00118 };
